    • Constructor Detail

      • GameModel

        public GameModel(int timeout,
                 java.lang.String gameType,
                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> startingHands)
        Purpose: Instantiates the game model to the appropriate start state based on timeout, numOfPlayer and gameType.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the turn time limit in seconds for each player. Must be 1 <=.
        startingHands - hands of cards for all the current players.
        gameType - the type of game to be played. Must be "default", "extended", and "wild".

        Parameters:
        startinghands - Array of Array of strings representing each player's hand.
